As opposed to AMM based DEXs, the prices of assets traded on Flex are determined by the real market.

True DeFi Experience

FLEX is the fastest decentralized exchange with a limit order book, capable of executing hundreds of thousands of transactions per second thanks to its underlying blockchain technology Everscale, which set the world record with 54K TPS in a real world decentralized environment.

Launch Exchange
Flex will dethrone Binance performance with 15 workchains while enabling interoperability for the growing DeFi2.0 landscape

Killer feature 1

Built on EVER OS the only blockchain based platform on the planet for decentralized internet that infinitely scales without compromising security

Total supply of FLX will never exceed 600 mln.

All FLEX revenues will go into a special internal pool which will be managed by FLX protocol.

This pool is called FLX Internal Liquidity Pool (FLIP).

Depending on the market conditions FLIP will use its liquidity for market making.

The FLIP pool is collectively owned by FLX token holders. This way FLX holders are entitled to all revenue streams of Flex during its lifetime.
